problem: I have attended 51 classes out of 75 each day 4 classes happens how manyday i have to attend more to make my attendence more than 75 percent
solution_steps:
1. Total classes attended so far: 51
2. Total classes conducted so far: 75
3. To achieve more than 75% attendance, required attended classes: 75% of total classes conducted + 1 (to exceed 75%) = 57
4. Classes needed to attend: 57 - 51 = 6
